018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.bucket;
019
020import java.io.FileOutputStream;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.util.Comparator;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.NavigableSet;
026import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
027import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListSet;
028import java.util.function.Function;
029import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ByteBuffAllocator;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ByteBuffAllocator.Recycler;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockCacheKey;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockPriority;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockType;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheableDeserializerIdManager;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.HFileBlock;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Pair;
038import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
039
040import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString;
041
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.BucketCacheProtos;
043
044@InterfaceAudience.Private
045final class BucketProtoUtils {
046
047  final static byte[] PB_MAGIC_V2 = new byte[] { 'V', '2', 'U', 'F' };
048
049  private BucketProtoUtils() {
050
051  }
052
053  static BucketCacheProtos.BucketCacheEntry toPB(BucketCache cache,
054    BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap backingMap) {
055    return BucketCacheProtos.BucketCacheEntry.newBuilder().setCacheCapacity(cache.getMaxSize())
056      .setIoClass(cache.ioEngine.getClass().getName())
057      .setMapClass(cache.backingMap.getClass().getName())
058      .putAllDeserializers(CacheableDeserializerIdManager.save())
059      .putAllCachedFiles(toCachedPB(cache.fullyCachedFiles)).setBackingMap(backingMap)
060      .setChecksum(ByteString
061        .copyFrom(((PersistentIOEngine) cache.ioEngine).calculateChecksum(cache.getAlgorithm())))
062      .build();
063  }
064
065  public static void serializeAsPB(BucketCache cache, FileOutputStream fos, long chunkSize,
066    long numChunks) throws IOException {
067    int blockCount = 0;
068    int chunkCount = 0;
069    int backingMapSize = cache.backingMap.size();
070    BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap.Builder builder = BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap.newBuilder();
071
072    fos.write(PB_MAGIC_V2);
073    fos.write(Bytes.toBytes(chunkSize));
074    fos.write(Bytes.toBytes(numChunks));
075
076    for (Map.Entry<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry> entry : cache.backingMap.entrySet()) {
077      blockCount++;
078      builder.addEntry(
079        BucketCacheProtos.BackingMapEntry.newBuilder().setKey(BucketProtoUtils.toPB(entry.getKey()))
080          .setValue(BucketProtoUtils.toPB(entry.getValue())).build());
081      if (blockCount % chunkSize == 0 || (blockCount == backingMapSize)) {
082        chunkCount++;
083        if (chunkCount == 1) {
084          // Persist all details along with the first chunk into BucketCacheEntry
085          BucketProtoUtils.toPB(cache, builder.build()).writeDelimitedTo(fos);
086        } else {
087          // Directly persist subsequent backing-map chunks.
088          builder.build().writeDelimitedTo(fos);
089        }
090        if (blockCount < backingMapSize) {
091          builder = BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap.newBuilder();
092        }
093      }
094    }
095  }
096
097  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey toPB(BlockCacheKey key) {
098    return BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey.newBuilder().setHfilename(key.getHfileName())
099      .setOffset(key.getOffset()).setPrimaryReplicaBlock(key.isPrimary())
100      .setBlockType(toPB(key.getBlockType())).build();
101  }
102
103  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockType toPB(BlockType blockType) {
104    switch (blockType) {
105      case DATA:
106        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.data;
107      case META:
108        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.meta;
109      case TRAILER:
110        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.trailer;
111      case INDEX_V1:
112        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.index_v1;
113      case FILE_INFO:
114        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.file_info;
115      case LEAF_INDEX:
116        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.leaf_index;
117      case ROOT_INDEX:
118        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.root_index;
119      case BLOOM_CHUNK:
120        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.bloom_chunk;
121      case ENCODED_DATA:
122        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.encoded_data;
123      case GENERAL_BLOOM_META:
124        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.general_bloom_meta;
125      case INTERMEDIATE_INDEX:
126        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.intermediate_index;
127      case DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META:
128        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockType.delete_family_bloom_meta;
129      default:
130        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockType.");
131    }
132  }
133
134  private static BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry toPB(BucketEntry entry) {
135    return BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry.newBuilder().setOffset(entry.offset())
136      .setCachedTime(entry.getCachedTime()).setLength(entry.getLength())
137      .setDiskSizeWithHeader(entry.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader())
138      .setDeserialiserIndex(entry.deserializerIndex).setAccessCounter(entry.getAccessCounter())
139      .setPriority(toPB(entry.getPriority())).build();
140  }
141
142  private static BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority toPB(BlockPriority p) {
143    switch (p) {
144      case MULTI:
145        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.multi;
146      case MEMORY:
147        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.memory;
148      case SINGLE:
149        return BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.single;
150      default:
151        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockPriority.");
152    }
153  }
154
155  static Pair<ConcurrentHashMap<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry>, NavigableSet<BlockCacheKey>> fromPB(
156    Map<Integer, String> deserializers, BucketCacheProtos.BackingMap backingMap,
157    Function<BucketEntry, Recycler> createRecycler) throws IOException {
158    ConcurrentHashMap<BlockCacheKey, BucketEntry> result = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
159    NavigableSet<BlockCacheKey> resultSet = new ConcurrentSkipListSet<>(Comparator
160      .comparing(BlockCacheKey::getHfileName).thenComparingLong(BlockCacheKey::getOffset));
161    for (BucketCacheProtos.BackingMapEntry entry : backingMap.getEntryList()) {
162      BucketCacheProtos.BlockCacheKey protoKey = entry.getKey();
163      BlockCacheKey key = new BlockCacheKey(protoKey.getHfilename(), protoKey.getOffset(),
164        protoKey.getPrimaryReplicaBlock(), fromPb(protoKey.getBlockType()));
165      BucketCacheProtos.BucketEntry protoValue = entry.getValue();
166      // TODO:We use ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP here, because we could not get the ByteBuffAllocator
167      // which created by RpcServer elegantly.
168      BucketEntry value = new BucketEntry(protoValue.getOffset(), protoValue.getLength(),
169        protoValue.getDiskSizeWithHeader(), protoValue.getAccessCounter(),
170        protoValue.getCachedTime(),
171        protoValue.getPriority() == BucketCacheProtos.BlockPriority.memory, createRecycler,
172        ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP);
173      // This is the deserializer that we stored
174      int oldIndex = protoValue.getDeserialiserIndex();
175      String deserializerClass = deserializers.get(oldIndex);
176      if (deserializerClass == null) {
177        throw new IOException("Found deserializer index without matching entry.");
178      }
179      // Convert it to the identifier for the deserializer that we have in this runtime
180      if (deserializerClass.equals(HFileBlock.BlockDeserializer.class.getName())) {
181        int actualIndex = HFileBlock.BLOCK_DESERIALIZER.getDeserializerIdentifier();
182        value.deserializerIndex = (byte) actualIndex;
183      } else {
184        // We could make this more plugable, but right now HFileBlock is the only implementation
185        // of Cacheable outside of tests, so this might not ever matter.
186        throw new IOException("Unknown deserializer class found: " + deserializerClass);
187      }
188      result.put(key, value);
189      resultSet.add(key);
190    }
191    return new Pair<>(result, resultSet);
192  }
193
194  private static BlockType fromPb(BucketCacheProtos.BlockType blockType) {
195    switch (blockType) {
196      case data:
197        return BlockType.DATA;
198      case meta:
199        return BlockType.META;
200      case trailer:
201        return BlockType.TRAILER;
202      case index_v1:
203        return BlockType.INDEX_V1;
204      case file_info:
205        return BlockType.FILE_INFO;
206      case leaf_index:
207        return BlockType.LEAF_INDEX;
208      case root_index:
209        return BlockType.ROOT_INDEX;
210      case bloom_chunk:
211        return BlockType.BLOOM_CHUNK;
212      case encoded_data:
213        return BlockType.ENCODED_DATA;
214      case general_bloom_meta:
215        return BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META;
216      case intermediate_index:
217        return BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX;
218      case delete_family_bloom_meta:
219        return BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META;
220      default:
221        throw new Error("Unrecognized BlockType.");
222    }
223  }
224
225  static Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap>
226    toCachedPB(Map<String, Pair<String, Long>> prefetchedHfileNames) {
227    Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap> tmpMap = new HashMap<>();
228    prefetchedHfileNames.forEach((hfileName, regionPrefetchMap) -> {
229      BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap tmpRegionFileSize =
230        BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap.newBuilder().setRegionName(regionPrefetchMap.getFirst())
231          .setRegionCachedSize(regionPrefetchMap.getSecond()).build();
232      tmpMap.put(hfileName, tmpRegionFileSize);
233    });
234    return tmpMap;
235  }
236
237  static Map<String, Pair<String, Long>>
238    fromPB(Map<String, BucketCacheProtos.RegionFileSizeMap> prefetchHFileNames) {
239    Map<String, Pair<String, Long>> hfileMap = new HashMap<>();
240    prefetchHFileNames.forEach((hfileName, regionPrefetchMap) -> {
241      hfileMap.put(hfileName,
242        new Pair<>(regionPrefetchMap.getRegionName(), regionPrefetchMap.getRegionCachedSize()));
243    });
244    return hfileMap;
245  }
246}
